problem_text_cn: 如图,P是⊙O外一点,PA、PB分别交⊙O于C、D两点,已知⁀{AB}和⁀{CD}所对的圆心角分别为90°和50°,则∠P=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PA and PB intersect ⊙O at two points C and D respectively. It is known that the central angles of ⁀AB and ⁀CD are N_0 and N_1 respectively, then ∠P = ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理及三角形外角的性质,解题的关键是:熟记并能灵活应用圆周角定理及三角形外角的性质解题．
